Italee Lucas (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 12, na afọ 1989) bụ onye mba America-Angola ọkachamara Onye egwuregwu bọọlụ.
A mụrụ ya na United States, n'afọ 2015, e nyere Lucas nwa amaala Angola ma nwee ike igwu egwu maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Angola.
Lucas meriri asọmpi steeti na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị continental afọ na 2006 na afọ 2007.
Lucas meriri na afọ 2007 Powerade Jam fest ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị 3 point shootout.
Lucas bụ onye otu USA nke sonyere na asọmpi U18 na Colorado Springs, Colorado na June afọ 2006

Ndị otu ahụ meriri egwuregwu anọ niile, nweta ihe nrite ọla edo na iru eru maka afọ 2007 U19 asọmpi ụwa. Ọ gara n'ihu na otu ahụ n'afọ sochirinụ mgbe otu ahụ sonyere na asọmpi U19 na Bratislava, Slovakia n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2007
Ọ na-enweta nkezi 4.9 n'egwuregwu ọ bụla ma dekọọ 23 nyere aka nke abụọ kachasị elu na otu ahụ bụ ndị otu USA meriri egwuregwu itoolu niile na nrite ọla edo.
Lucas mechiri oge ikpeazụ ya na Mahadum nke North Carolina na Chapel Hill na-enweta akara 16.2, 3.1 rebounds, na 2.6 nyere aka n'egwuregwu ọ bụla na oge 2010 1911.
